The place was dark, lit only by some computer monitors. Also, this was 
a space station, and at this time of the night, lights were usually 
not all bright and sparkle. The other reason was because the commander 
of the base considered it shook claustrophobia out of his troops.

The commander was a huge robot. He was the leader of the Quasacons, a 
highly recognized Sadisticon unit in the Predacon ranks. He held them 
with an iron grip and would never accept their disobeyance. However, 
he left them sufficient space to give their ideas and express 
themselves. He was a tough commander, not a tyrant.

Warhead: All Quasacons meet up on the bridge. We have received orders 
and we all get ready now!

His voice had boomed loud in the speaker all over the base. That 
should wake them up!
